Ahn Jung Hoon

Korean: 안정훈

Ahn Jung-hoon

Height:

149.9 lbs (68 kg)
Group (2021):
SHAX

Introduction

Ahn Jung Hoon is a South Korean actor. He made his debut in 2018 on the web-drama "A-Teen". In 2021, he was a part of the fictional boy group SHAX, created for KBS2's drama "Imitation".
